Job Description  
  
Some careers shine brighter than others.  
  
If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.  
  
HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.  
  
We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Associate Project Manager

MediaLab is a media & technology company focused on acquiring and growing properties and global brands. The organization is a unique combination of private equity, holding company and operating entity. We continue to expand and are proud of the prominent market position of our brands.

  

Come join an exceptionally talented team of engineers, designers, product and business builders. HQ is located in sunny Santa Monica, California with growing teams in New York, and across cities in the US and Latin America.

  

**Your Role at MediaLab**

  

MediaLab Engineering supports a growing number of applications across multiple business verticals which have been acquired through a careful selection process to integrate with its internal Ad platform that processes billions of impressions a month.

  

As an Android Engineer, you will be responsible for the development of both WorldStar HipHop and Amino apps, two key brands of MediaLab.

  

WorldStar HipHop is the N°1 urban news platform in the US that offers a perfect mix of exclusive music videos, user footage, hilarious comedy, sports highlights, movie trailers, interviews, viral clips and more daily.

  

Amino is our social networking brand, is a platform designed for people to connect over shared interests. It allows users to join or create communities which are focused on specific topics, such as gaming, anime, music, movies, art, or general hobbies.

  

**What You'll Do**

  

-   Own the development, testing and maintenance of both WSHH and Amino Apps
-   Ship reliable software through test automation and code reviews
-   Fix bugs and improve application performance
-   Be able to document the work and help plan for the future
-   Work with a small team to produce and ensure delivery of quality, readable and well-tested code
-   Partner with business stakeholders to deliver features on time and to specification
-   Promote the adoption of new technologies while continuously advancing and evolving our legacy codebase as well as refine our best practices and processes

  

**What We're Searching For**

  

-   Minimum 4+ years of native android development experience. Additional software development experience is preferred but not required
-   B.S. degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field preferred but not required
-   Solid understanding Android tools (Android SDK, Android Studio, Gradle)
-   Good understanding of commonly used libraries (Jetpack, Compose, Retrofit, Firebase)
-   Experience with CI/CD tools
-   Experience with Java and Kotlin
-   Self-motivated with strong communication and problem-solving skills
-   Passionate about writing clean, well organized and production-ready code
-   At least one application already built and in the Play Store

  

_At MediaLab, we rely on a range of backgrounds, experiences, and ideas. We value diversity, and we’re proud to be an inclusive, equal opportunity workplace._

**Про клієнта**

Проєкт клієнта розробляє інтелектуальні замки та рішення для керування доступом для додатків із високим рівнем безпеки. Їхні продукти використовуються в різних галузях промисловості, включаючи банківські та комунальні підприємства.

**Про проект**

Як Senior Android Developer, ви станете частиною невеликої, але динамічної команди науково-дослідних розробок, відповідальної за проектування, розробку та підтримку мобільних програм, які мають вирішальне значення для екосистеми продуктів наших клієнтів. Ви працюватимете над передовими рішеннями для керування доступом і зробите внесок у наступне покоління інтелектуальної безпеки.

**Обов'язки**

-   Розробляти та підтримувати нативні програми для **Android** за допомогою **Java/Kotlin.**
-   Розробляти інтеграції з розумними замками **Bluetooth LE (BLE)** і серверними **API.**
-   Оптимізувати продуктивність і взаємодію з користувачем.
-   Працювати з **AWS, Firebase SDK** і розробляти власні SDK.
-   Проводити перевірки коду, тестування та **CI/CD** інтеграцію.

**Вимоги**

-   3+ роки досвіду мобільної розробки під **Android (Kotlin/Java)**.
-   Великий досвід роботи з **BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy).**
-   Вміння інтегрувати **REST / GraphQL API**.
-   Перевірений досвід створення та підтримки мобільних додатків із високим трафіком (понад 10 тисяч активних користувачів).
-   Вміння працювати як самостійно, так і в команді.
-   Знання англійської мови на рівні **Upper-Intermediate** або вище.

**Як плюс**

-   Досвід роботи з повним життєвим циклом програми: ідея, розробка, розгортання та обслуговування.
-   Знайомство з конвеєрами CI/CD для мобільних додатків.
-   Попередній досвід роботи в середовищі стартапу або малого підприємства.
-   Практичний досвід роботи з **AWS SDK** і **Firebase SDK**.
-   Досвід розробки кросплатформних мобільних додатків (Flutter, React Native)
-   Знайомство з Bluetooth, системами розумного замка або пристроями IoT.

**About Us**

We’re a dedicated and lean team on a mission to make education more compatible with life. We know firsthand how tough the life of a student can be, so we built Studyflash (https://studyflash.ai) — an AI-powered study platform that automates and optimizes learning journeys. Think of it as Quizlet but with a laser focus on making university students’ lives easier with AI magic.

  

As an official University of Bern startup, we’ve received strong support from Microsoft, Innosuisse, and others. Most importantly, we’ve already welcomed over 150,000 students into the Studyflash community. With 10x ARR growth in the past six months, we’re scaling sustainably and ambitiously.

  

**About You**

We’re looking for someone who:

-   Has 3+ years of experience in mobile development with React Native
-   Experience with Expo (preferred)
-   Has excellent problem-solving skills and thrives in a fast-paced, startup environment.
-   Is comfortable taking ownership of the mobile application and delivering high-quality results.
-   Understands the nuances of mobile-first design and can create seamless user experiences.
-   Is skilled in integrating mobile-native functionalities (e.g., push notifications, offline capabilities, complex UI interactions).

  

**About the Position**

We’re looking for a Medior Mobile Developer to take full responsibility for our mobile app, working under the guidance of our CTO. This is an exciting opportunity to shape the mobile experience of an app already loved by thousands of students, leveraging React Native and Expo to deliver seamless, mobile-first functionality.

  

As our Mobile Developer, you’ll:

-   Develop and launch our Android app, bringing Studyflash to even more users based on our IOS application.
-   Replicate and refine features from our web app in the mobile app to ensure feature parity.
-   Focus on mobile-first and native functionalities, ensuring an optimized and smooth user experience.
-   Leverage React Native and Expo to build and maintain a robust, scalable mobile application.
-   Collaborate with the CTO and the engineering team to ensure alignment with our platform’s vision.
-   Continuously enhance the app by integrating native features like notifications.

  

**What We Offer**

-   Competitive salary
-   The excitement and fast pace of startup life, where no two days are the same.
-   A steep learning curve in a collaborative, international, and flat team structure.
-   Significant ownership of your work and visible impact on the product.
-   Flexible working hours.
-   25 days of vacation to recharge.

India’s largest digital lending story is brewing here. It’s your opportunity to be a part of the story!

**Job Description**  
  
**Key Responsibilities-**  
  

-   Android Development : Lead the development and architecture of Android application. Having Airbnb’s Mavericks framework knowledge is an added advantage.
-   Full Android Lifecycle : Manage the entire lifecycle of Android applications, from conceptualization, development, and testing to deployment and post-launch support.

**Strong Debugging Skills** : Expertise in using Android Studio’s debugging and profiling tools to solve complex issues.

**Job Summary**:

**Responsibilities:**

-   Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
-   Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
-   Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
-   Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
-   Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies.

  

**Required Qualifications:**

-   Bachelor’s degree
-   Proven experience as a Native Mobile Developer.
-   Proficiency in Swift (for iOS) and Kotlin/Java (for Android).
-   Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles.
-   Experience with RESTful APIs to connect mobile applications to back-end services.
-   Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications.
-   Knowledge of code versioning tools such as Git.
-   Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

**Role Overview**

-   **Integration**: Integrate mobile apps with backend APIs, third-party libraries, and services.
-   **Testing**: Ensure applications are thoroughly tested (unit, integration, and UI) and perform well across a range of devices and operating system versions.
-   **Optimization**: Optimize applications for performance, speed, and scalability.
-   **Collaboration**: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and QA engineers.
-   **Code Quality**: Follow best practices for coding, version control, and documentation.
-   **Innovation**: Stay updated with the latest trends in mobile development and bring innovative ideas to enhance the product.

**Qualifications**

**Technical Skills**:

-   Proficiency in **Swift** (iOS) and **Kotlin** (Android).
-   Experience with cross-platform frameworks like **Flutter** or **React Native** is a plus.
-   Strong understanding of mobile development lifecycle, MVVM/MVP architectures, and design patterns.
-   Familiarity with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and third-party integration.
-   Knowledge of mobile app security, performance optimization, and offline storage solutions.
-   Experience with CI/CD pipelines for mobile development.

**Tools & Platforms**:

-   Proficient with **Xcode**, **Android Studio**, and relevant debugging tools.
-   Familiarity with Firebase, analytics platforms, and mobile testing frameworks like Appium or XCTest.
-   Knowledge of version control tools like **Git**.

**Soft Skills**

-   Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
-   Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
-   Adaptability to a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
-   Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality products.

**Position:** Android Developer

**Location**: Pune

**Department:** Engineering

  

**Overview:**

We are looking for a talented Android Developer with experience in building high-performance,

scalable, and secure mobile applications for the Android platform. The ideal candidate will

have good grasp in Java and/or Kotlin and the Android SDK, as well as a solid understanding

of mobile app lifecycle, UI/UX best practices, and performance optimization. You will be

responsible for developing and maintaining Android apps, collaborating with backend

developers to integrate APIs, and ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.

  

**Key Responsibilities:**

● Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for the Android platform using Java

and/or Kotlin.

● Work closely with the backend team to integrate RESTful APIs and ensure smooth

communication between the mobile app and backend services.

● Optimize mobile apps for performance, reliability, and scalability, ensuring smooth user

experiences even in resource-constrained environments.

● Leverage Android NDK for performance-sensitive features or to work with low-level

system libraries and hardware components.

● Knowledge of app security best practices (e.g., data encryption, securing API keys)

● Implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth, JWT)

to safeguard user data and ensure app security.

● Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and prevent regressions using

tools such as JUnit and Espresso.

● Debug and troubleshoot issues across a variety of Android devices and OS versions,

ensuring cross-device compatibility.

● Participate in code reviews, ensuring the code is clean, well-structured, and

maintainable.

● Handle the app deployment process to Google Play Store, including versioning,

compliance, and submission requirements.

● Open to learn and work in any and all latest technologies.

  

**Technologies Required:**

● Kotlin or Java for Android development

● Android SDK and Android Studio for app development and testing

● Android NDK (Native Development Kit) for building native libraries and performance-

critical features

● RESTful API integration

● Gradle for project automation and dependency management

● Version control using Git (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, etc.)

● JSON for data interchange between mobile app and backend services

● Push Notifications (Firebase Cloud Messaging, etc.)

● Knowledge of SQLite and Room Database for local storage on Android

● Firebase for authentication, cloud messaging, push notifications, and real-time data

● Android Jetpack libraries (e.g., Navigation, LiveData, ViewModel, etc.)

● Familiarity with Google Play Console for app submission, versioning, and compliance

with Google’s app store policies

● Knowledge of App bundles and Gradle build flavors for app distribution

  

Nice to Have:

● Develop intuitive and responsive user interfaces following the Material Design

guidelines to ensure the best user experience across various screen sizes.

● Implement third-party libraries and APIs (e.g., Firebase, Google Maps, Push

Notifications) to extend app functionality.

● Experience in integrating third-party SDKs and APIs (e.g., payment gateways, social

media logins)

● Familiarity with App Architecture Patterns like MVVM or MVP for Android development

● Experience with mobile analytics platforms (e.g., Firebase Analytics, Google

Analytics)
